item.title: Git Etiquette
item.description: Five simple practices to Git like a pro and make your collaborators (and your future self) happier.

item.title: Build uAMQP Python wheel for arm64v8
item.description: Build Microsoft uAMQP Python package painlessly with Manylinux docker image

item.title: Capture Python subprocess output in real-time
item.description: The Interwebs are full of recipes on how to capture and stream the output of a Python subprocess in real-time. Most of them don’t work, so here’s how to do it (with Python 3)

item.title: Oracle Client and Python on Apple Silicon
item.description: Setting up your Apple Silicon Mac for linking and running x86 software. Build and run x86 Python natively (and with Docker)

item.title: Building this site with HUGO
item.description: How I went from knowing nothing about HUGO framework to publishing my first custom website in just few days, all thanks to HUGO great ecosystem.
